oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhihi Natījat al-afkār fī aʻmāl al-layl wa-al-nahār / taʼlīf al-Imām al-mudaqqiq al-ḥāsib al-muḥarrir farīd ʻaṣrih wa-waḥīd dahrih Riḍwān Afandī : manuscript, 1702
Natījat al-afkār fī aʻmāl al-layl wa-al-nahār
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Razzāz, Riḍwān ibn ʻAbd Allāh , -1710
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Abū al-Jūd, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad. (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column in black and red, 17 lines per pages, each line framed within a red line.

According to end of f. 6r, copy completed on 12 Ramaḍān 1113 AH [February 9, 1702 AD] in the hand of ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Riḍwān al-Wasīmī al-Ḥanafī al-Rifāʻī al-Shinnāwī al-Shādhilī al-mukanná bi-Abī al-Jūd al-muwaqqit bi-Jāmiʻ al-Malik al-Muʼayyad Abū al-Naṣr.
بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم يا من سمك السماء وزينها بالكواكب وسيرها قدرته رب المشارق والمغارب. :Incipit
تمت الكواكب بعون الله وحسن توفيقه. :Colophon
Ownership statement signed Ibrāhīm, who purchased the book from al-Ḥājj Ḥasan al-Ghayaṭānī (?) in Rabīʻ al-Ākhir 1120 AH [June 1708 AD].
Waqf of Ibrāhīm ibn Murād al-Shādhilī al-Ḥanafī to Azhar mosque (statement partly obliterated).
MS Arab 85. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Astronomy, Arab
Astronomy
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: نتيجة الأفكار في أعمال الليل والنهار
هذه نتيجة الأفكار في أعمال الليل والنهار / تأليف الإمام المدقق الحاسب المحرر فريد عصره ووحيد دهره رضوان افندي : مخطوطة، 1702
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: أبو الجود، عبد الرحمن بن أحمد. (copyist.)
